name: Solar Winds: Galaxy
storyline: After being lead into a death trap by your Government, you managed to escape your solar system with the aid of a strange portal. Upon arriving at your destination, you were left waiting for a contact that would help you return home. Now, a year later, the time has come...
summary: Sequel to Solar Winds: The Escape, you play the role of Jake Stone, a bounty hunter seeking to save his people from destruction.
